# /project-context

> ROLE: SYSTEM_THINKING

## Purpose
Stores project-specific context that persists across sessions.
Generated by workflow gates.

## When to use
- Automatically populated by workflow
- Reference during execution
- Update when scope changes

## When NOT to use
- Don't manually create (workflow does it)
- Don't edit without re-running workflow

## Required Gate
Created BY gates, not used to pass them.

## Files (auto-generated)
| File | Created At | Purpose |
|------|------------|---------|
| IDEA.md | Gate 0 | Original problem/idea |
| MARKET_VALIDATION.md | Gate 1 | Market validation notes |
| SCOPE_LOCK.md | Gate 2 | Locked scope snapshot |
| INVARIANTS.md | Gate 3 | Things that must not change |
| ASSUMPTIONS.md | Any | Documented assumptions |
| RISKS.md | Any | Known risks |
